response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth far more than its monetary value. This unique item holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its unparalleled quality and rarity, I am confident it would greatly enhance your life or business endeavors.

Considering the immense value this product offers to you, I am proposing a purchase price of $1,350,000. This figure represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth and the potential market value, aiming to be fair to both parties while ensuring a profitable transaction for me.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you require any additional information about the product. I am here to answer any questions and facilitate a smooth negotiation process.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
